Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Leverage Technology Development To Build A Better Future – CEPE invites…

item.description:
Once again Center For Practical Education (CEPE) is holding another webinar as part of its core objective to encourage a more practical form of theoretical education in the country and possibly, worldwide. For some couple of time, this foundation has strived to promote a need for “The use of the mind, heart and hand“ instead...

item.title: Update and Agree Or Lose Your Whatsapp – Whatsapp’s New Terms
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Unfortunately, it has been noted that WhatsApp running on older Android and iPhone devices will cease to be supported on the latest version of the messaging app, requiring owners to either update their mobile operating system or buy a new compatible mobile device...

item.title: Whatsapp New Feature – You Can Now Be Able To Permanently Mute Messages
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
This feature initially permits users to disallow message notifications from groups and individual contacts for a period of time specifically to suit the user, now allows it without any time limit even for groups...
